scripts.text:
insert into [BcAdfLido].[NOTAM]
([Length]
      ,[Format]
      ,[SubFormat]
      ,[Type]
      ,[SubType]
      ,[Publisher]
      ,[Class]
      ,[Series]
      ,[Year]
      ,[Number]
      ,[SubNumber]
      ,[Multipart]
      ,[QCode23]
      ,[QCode45]
      ,[EffectiveFrom]
      ,[EffectiveTill]
      ,[EST]
      ,[HeaderIcaoAirportCode]
      ,[YearOfReferenceNotam]
      ,[NumberOfReferenceNotam]
      ,[Unimportant1]
      ,[Unimportant2]
      ,[NumberAndType]
      ,[IcaoCodeFIR]
      ,[Code]
      ,[Traffic]
      ,[Purpose]
      ,[Scope]
      ,[Lower]
      ,[Upper]
      ,[GeoLatitudeNm]
      ,[GeoLongitudeNm]
      ,[GeoRadiusNm]
      ,[IcaoAirportCode]
      ,[ActivityStart]
      ,[ValidityEnd]
      ,[Schedule]
      ,[Text]
      ,[LowerLimit]
      ,[UpperLimit]
      ,[MessageText]
      ,[TCreatedId]
      ,[TLoadDate]
      ,[TFilename])
select [Length]
      ,[Format]
      ,[SubFormat]
      ,[Type]
      ,[SubType]
      ,[Publisher]
      ,[Class]
      ,[Series]
      ,[Year]
      ,[Number]
      ,[SubNumber]
      ,[Multipart]
      ,[QCode23]
      ,[QCode45]
      ,[EffectiveFrom]
      ,[EffectiveTill]
      ,[EST]
      ,[HeaderIcaoAirportCode]
      ,[YearOfReferenceNotam]
      ,[NumberOfReferenceNotam]
      ,[Unimportant1]
      ,[Unimportant2]
      ,[NumberAndType]
      ,[IcaoCodeFIR]
      ,[Code]
      ,[Traffic]
      ,[Purpose]
      ,[Scope]
      ,[Lower]
      ,[Upper]
      ,[GeoLatitudeNm]
      ,[GeoLongitudeNm]
      ,[GeoRadiusNm]
      ,[IcaoAirportCode]
      ,[ActivityStart]
      ,[ValidityEnd]
      ,[Schedule]
      ,[Text]
      ,[LowerLimit]
      ,[UpperLimit]
      ,[MessageText]
      ,[TCreatedId]
      ,[TLoadDate]
      ,[TFilename]
  FROM [BcAdfLido].notam_tmp
where TFilename=@pfilename
